content.raw:
When trying to run `simple_demo` I get the following output:

```
[Err] [RenderEngineManager.cc:94] No render-engine registered with name: optix
Engine 'optix' is not supported
segfault
```

Here is a backtrace:

```
#0  0x0000000000000000 in ?? ()
#1  0x00007ffff54a9c2f in ignition::rendering::BaseCamera<ignition::rendering::OgreSensor>::Update (this=0x7fffffffda30)
    at /data/ignition/ign-rendering/include/ignition/rendering/base/BaseCamera.hh:178
#2  0x00000000004067af in GlutInitCamera (
    _camera=std::shared_ptr (count 7, weak 1) 0xc91380)
    at /data/ignition/ign-rendering/examples/simple_demo/GlutWindow.cc:177
#3  0x0000000000406ef8 in GlutRun (
    _cameras=std::vector of length 1, capacity 1 = {...})
    at /data/ignition/ign-rendering/examples/simple_demo/GlutWindow.cc:81
#4  0x00000000004038cf in main (_argc=1, _argv=<optimized out>)
    at /data/ignition/ign-rendering/examples/simple_demo/Main.cc:182
```

I don't have optix installed.
